title: Dutch West India Company Report MCQ 3

content.question: The report’s position on the proposed transfer of Luanda to the Dutch is best understood in light of the authors’ goal to

choices.label: secure profits from the rapidly expanding trans-Atlantic slave trade
highlight the gender and family imbalances created by the slave trade
recommend that the company expand its operations to the Indian Ocean and the spice islands of Southeast Asia
offer a comparison between the profitability of East African versus West African slave trade routes

content.answer: secure profits from the rapidly expanding trans-Atlantic slave trade

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
